TEXT.BODY: Oper shr loss five cts vs loss six cts Oper net loss 157,688 vs loss 96,573 Revs 1,094,331 vs 1,378,973 Avg shrs 3,315,654 vs 1,661,023 Six mths Oper shr loss seven cts vs loss 24 cts Oper net loss 198,555 vs loss 394,589 Net 2,243,377 vs 2,440,850 Avg shrs 2,796,848 vs 1,637,592 NOTE: Current year 2nd qtr and six mths excludes a loss 10,767 dlrs for discontinued operations.
